Test Name: Very Long Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenase Deficiency (VLCAD), Full Gene Analysis
Purpose: To analyze the full ACADVL gene for variants associated with Very Long Chain Acyl-CoA Dehydrogenase Deficiency.
Equipment: Automated DNA extractor (e.g., Qiagen EZ1 Advanced XL); Thermal cycler (e.g., ABI 9700); SeqStudio Genetic Analyzer or equivalent; Vortex mixer
